sentence.Network_en: The Cruor Alluvium event in Deathtoll will now progress properly.
sentence.Network_cn: 死亡丧钟内的CruorAlluvium事件将正确的运作.

sentence.Network_en: Many mining engineering subjects are established on geologic condition of alluvium.
sentence.Network_cn: 众多矿业工程均建设于冲击地层的地质环境之中.

sentence.Network_en: Examples of application of the method include the results of a regional water and alluvium study.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为方法应用的实例,列举了区域河水和沉积物研究所得结果.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英汉地质词典 - 豆丁网 ... alluvion 冲积层 alluvium 冲积层 alm andine 铁铝榴石.
土地词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... alluvial sand 冲积沙 alluvium 冲积物 alteration 改建.
更新世又称洪积世(Diluvium),从300万年前至1万年前;全新世又称冲积世(Alluvium),从1万年前至现代。第四纪有两大特点,一是此期气候变化剧烈,高纬度地区发生过.
冲积土(Alluvium)河川在平原之流速减缓,泥砂逐渐沉积而成冲积土之异向性大,粒径.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: Latin, neuter of alluvius 'washed against', from ad- 'towards' + luere 'to wash'

means.word_mean: 1. clay or silt or gravel carried by rushing streams and deposited where the stream slows down
